title: New Senate bill would give Commerce a more direct route to ban TikTok
description: The bill marks the federal government’s latest attempt to resolve a standoff with TikTok, the wildly popular short-video app owned by the Chinese company ByteDance.

title: Elon Musk grills former Twitter worker online, accuses him of not working
description: The billionaire has gotten into another high-profile tangle on the social network he owns.

title: Biden FCC nominee withdraws, following bruising lobbying battle
description: Gigi Sohn's decision leaves the agency deadlocked -- and Biden's internet promises in limbo

title: Are you mindlessly scrolling? Here’s how to tame your bad tech habit.
description: Even a good digital habit can cross the line into an unhealthy compulsion. How to tell good digital habits from bad ones and break the hold of compulsions.

title: Japan forced to explode own space rocket during launch
description: Japan's space agency was forced to destroy its flagship H3 rocket minutes after blastoff due to an ignition failure, in a blow to the country's space endeavors.

title: ChatGPT is coming to Slack, and it will help write your messages
description: Chat AI bots that can do research, compose emails and summarize meetings are popping up everywhere -- soon they'll be on Slack.

title: Amazon’s belt-tightening affects towns across the U.S.
description: As Amazon presses pause on construction of HQ2 in Virginia, other towns and cities are feeling the impact of the tech behemoth's belt-tightening, too.

title: FBI, Pentagon helped research facial recognition for street cameras, drones
description: Hundreds of pages of records chronicle the FBI’s years-long attempt to upgrade its facial recognition capabilities to match those deployed in China and Britain.
